item.description:
Hi all,
I was born and raised in the Boston area, speak American English and enjoy meeting new people and learning about other cultures. I am open to ideas but how about meeting in Porter Sq and have a bite to eat at a pizza place like Zing Pizza or the Porter Exchange. A casual bite to eat and talking might be nice.

Ralph-

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Meet in Porter Square to eat at the Porter Exchange
